title: Electra's Multicolored Christmas
description: International hip-hop artist Ava “Electra” Jones travels to Tokyo, Japan to perform at the birthday party of the emperor and to spend Christmas with her lover Hiroki Nijo who she’s been dating for the last fourteen years. Instead of getting the beautiful white Christmas the southern belle always dreamed of, Ava discovers that Hiroki hasn’t told his family about their relationship and he has no intentions of doing so.Though Hiroki loves Ava he doesn’t want to subject her to his mother and aunt, the empress who tries to run his life and his eighteen-year-old cousin Koyoshi’s life. To make matters worse, Koyoshi has taken a fancy to Ava and plans to make a move on her at his father’s party. Can Kioshi keep Ava away from the future emperor of Japan without blowing his secret or his cool?
author: Imari Jade
